images.alt:
STATEMENT REGARDING DETENTION OF STANDING ROCK SIOUX TRIBE MEMBER IN MINNESOTA

JANUARY 24, 2026

I was notified today, January 24, 2026, that a Standing Rock Sioux Tribe member has been detained by the U.S. Immigrations and Customs Enforcement (ICE) in the state of Minnesota. Tribal leadership is actively working to locate the individual, gather accurate information, and coordinate with the appropriate authorities to secure their release.

At this time, details surrounding the detention remain limited. I urge the public to refrain from spreading unverified information while this matter is being reviewed.

Standing Rock Sioux Tribe will continue to advocate for the protection of our citizen's rights and will provide updates as appropriate.

STATEMENT REGARDING DETENTION OF STANDING ROCK SIOUX TRIBE MEMBER IN MINNESOTA

JANUARY 24, 2026

I was notified today, January 24, 2026, that a Standing Rock Sioux Tribe member has been detained by the U.S. Immigrations and Customs Enforcement (ICE) in the state of Minnesota. Tribal leadership is actively working to locate the individual, gather accurate information, and coordinate with the appropriate authorities to secure their release.

At this time, details surrounding the detention remain limited. I urge the public to refrain from spreading unverified information while this matter is being reviewed.

Standing Rock Sioux Tribe will continue to advocate for the protection of our citizen's rights and will provide updates as appropriate.

#YouFireworksAndOurPromise #KimiHanaMovie #Anime #AnimeNews #Summer2026

images.alt:
Mit einem Trailer wurde heute bekannt, dass die Light-Novel »Kimi to Hanabi to Yakusoku to« von Kaori Mado (Story) und Akamoku (Illustrationen) ein Anime-Film erhält. Passend dazu wurden ein Teaser Visual zur Ankündigung veröffentlicht. Die  japanische Kinostart ist für 17. Juli 2026 geplant.
»You, Fireworks, and Our Promise« entsteht nach Vorlage der Light Novel „Kimi to Hanabi to Yakusoku to“ von Mado Ka (Gagaga Bunko). Kei Suzuki führt Regie, das Drehbuch übernimmt Kouhei Mori und das Charakterdesign stammt von Yuuji Watanabe, basierend auf den Charakterentwürfen von Akamoku. Das Projekt wird von Shin-Ei Animation geplant und produziert, während die Animation bei SynergySP sowie The Answer Studio entsteht. Sound und Musik wurden bislang noch nicht angekündigt.

Die Light Novel Reihe wird seit dem 18. Dezember 2025, durch den Verlag Shogakukan veröffentlicht.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Vor der Kulisse des Nagaoka Festival Grand Fireworks Show, einem der drei größten Feuerwerksfestivals Japans, erzählt diese Geschichte von zwei Oberschülern, Makoto und Akira.
Obwohl sie weit voneinander entfernt in Tokio leben und sich nie begegnet sind, werden ihre Leben durch ein einziges geheimnisvolles Feuerwerksbild plötzlich miteinander verknüpft. Aus dieser rätselhaften Verbindung entsteht nach und nach Nähe, doch die Zeit drängt. Je näher das Festival rückt, desto mehr stehen Makoto und Akira vor einer Entscheidung, die ihre Zukunft für immer verändern könnte.

Conclusión: es una estructura perfectamente gramatical, pero no nos lo parece por parámetros de las palabras interrogativas en nuestros idiomas. Le he tenido que preguntar a Copilot y esto me ha dicho:

En principio ya he revisado algunos parámetros básicos y la oración quedaría así, sí siendo gramatical. No obstante, apenas encuentro información sobre partículas interrogativas totales y  posesivas, así que no puedo saber si hay movimientos implicados 😭

Si saco tiempo miraré la teoría X-barra para la gramática generativa japonesa a ver cómo se podría justificar esa oración o su agramaticalidad 🧐

Ahora intento compararla con la teoría de lenguas generales y no me encaja. Tengo que mirar los parámetros propios del japonés.

external.description:
While starting this post I realized I have been maintaining personal
infrastructure for over a decade!
Most of the things I’ve self-hosted is been for personal uses. Email server, a
blog, an IRC server, image hosting, RSS reader and so on. All of these things
has all been a bit all over the place and never properly streamlined. Some has
been in containers, some has just been flat files with a nginx service in front
and some has been a random installed Debian package from somewhere I just
forgot.
external.title: Personal infrastructure setup 2026

record.text:
Postgres. Timescale. Wal-g. Tailscale. GitHub Actions. SSH. And Copilot. 

32 attempts to make get it working.
Future is not yet here.
I guess I am doing it…

I am not planning to move people away from hosted services. If you can afford PlanetScale - use them! They are great. But most devs are forced to self host.
And from my experience while talking to fellow developers - they want to see which query is slow and how to improve it.
Tillfälligt förhoppningsvis! Vi får se.

value.text:
Kare 11 local news just read, in full, this statement from Michael and Susan Pretti, the parents of Alex Pretti. 

"Please get the truth out about our son."

images.alt:
Statement from Michael and Susan Pretti
Parents of Alex Jeffrey Pretti

“We are heartbroken but also very angry.

Alex was a kindhearted soul who cared deeply for his family and friends and also the American veterans whom he cared for as an ICU nurse at the Minneapolis VA hospital. Alex wanted to make a difference in this world. Unfortunately, he will not be with us to see his impact.

I do not throw around the ‘hero’ term lightly. However, his last thought and act was to protect a woman. The sickening lies told about our son by the administration are reprehensible and disgusting. Alex is clearly not holding a gun when attacked by Trump’s murdering and cowardly ICE thugs. He had his phone in his right hand and his empty left hand is raised above his head while trying to protect the woman ICE just pushed down, all while being pepper sprayed. 

Please get the truth out about our son. He was a good man. Thank you.

Statement from Michael and Susan Pretti
Parents of Alex Jeffrey Pretti

“We are heartbroken but also very angry.

Alex was a kindhearted soul who cared deeply for his family and friends and also the American veterans whom he cared for as an ICU nurse at the Minneapolis VA hospital. Alex wanted to make a difference in this world. Unfortunately, he will not be with us to see his impact.

I do not throw around the ‘hero’ term lightly. However, his last thought and act was to protect a woman. The sickening lies told about our son by the administration are reprehensible and disgusting. Alex is clearly not holding a gun when attacked by Trump’s murdering and cowardly ICE thugs. He had his phone in his right hand and his empty left hand is raised above his head while trying to protect the woman ICE just pushed down, all while being pepper sprayed. 

Please get the truth out about our son. He was a good man. Thank you.

《私見》
日本は“配ったお金(生保や年金)”は叩くけど“減税”は誰もチェックできない。
それって透明な財政とは言えない。
需要管理ができているか？
どの税優遇がどの層にどれだけの購買力を与えているかが見えなければインフレ管理も不可能。

高所得者・大企業向け税優遇が本当に《公共》目的か？
それとも既得権への恒久給付か？

納めた税金の使われ方だけでなく、減税がどこでどう効いてるのか。
少なくとも法人税減税は公共に資するものではなかった事が明らかなので、もう意味はないよねって国民が言わなきゃならないんだけど、そう言う総括が全くされないのが日本。
ММTを日本で運用するなら前提条件も適用すべし。

GTETIが見てるのは👇

「会計制度が何個(一般会計、特別会計)あるか」じゃない

「税の使い道を、国民が追えるか」

日本は
❌ 税制優遇の総額が見えない
❌ 誰が得してるか分からない
❌ 効果検証が弱い

→ 民主主義的コントロールが効かない

だから順位が低い。

③ 効果がなければ普通に廃止する

例：韓国

一定期間ごとに
「この税優遇、意味あった？」
と公式にレビュー。

効果が薄ければ
→ 延長しない / 縮小 / 廃止。

👉
税制が「既得権の温床」になりにくい。
